TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListener extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListener Implements IDisposable
public ref class HttpListener sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供一个简单的、可通过编程方式控制的 HTTP 协议侦听器。

span.span: Provides a simple, programmatically controlled HTTP protocol listener.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，可以创建一个简单的 HTTP 协议侦听器的响应 HTTP 请求。Using the class, you can create a simple HTTP protocol listener that responds to HTTP requests. 侦听器处于活动状态的生存期内对象和用其权限的应用程序中运行。The listener is active for the lifetime of the object and runs within your application with its permissions. 若要使用，创建的类使用的新实例构造函数，并使用属性来访问集合，它包含指定的统一资源标识符 (URI) 的字符串前缀应处理。To use , create a new instance of the class using the constructor and use the property to gain access to the collection that holds the strings that specify which Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefixes the should process. URI 的前缀字符串组成的方案 （http 或 https）、 主机、 可选端口和可选路径。A URI prefix string is composed of a scheme (http or https), a host, an optional port, and an optional path. 完整的前缀字符串的一个示例是*http://www.contoso.com:8080/customerData/*。An example of a complete prefix string is *http://www.contoso.com:8080/customerData/*. 前缀必须以正斜杠 （"/"） 结尾。Prefixes must end in a forward slash ("/"). 具有最为匹配请求的 URI 前缀对象响应请求。The object with the prefix that most closely matches a requested URI responds to the request. 多个对象不能添加相同的前缀;如果引发异常添加前缀已被使用。Multiple objects cannot add the same prefix; a exception is thrown if a adds a prefix that is already in use. 指定端口，主机元素可以被替换为"\*"以指示接受请求发送到端口，如果请求的 URI 与任何其他前缀不匹配。When a port is specified, the host element can be replaced with "\*" to indicate that the accepts requests sent to the port if the requested URI does not match any other prefix. 例如，若要接收的所有请求发送到端口 8080 时任何未处理请求的 URI ，该前缀*http://\*: 8080 /*。For example, to receive all requests sent to port 8080 when the requested URI is not handled by any , the prefix is *http://\*:8080/*. 同样，若要指定接受发送到的端口的所有请求的主机元素替换为"+"字符。Similarly, to specify that the accepts all requests sent to a port, replace the host element with the "+" character. 例如，*https://+:8080*。For example, *https://+:8080*. "\*"和"+"字符可出现在包含路径的前缀。The "\*" and "+" characters can be present in prefixes that include paths. 从.NET Core 2.0 或 Windows 10 上的.NET Framework 4.6 开始，在 URI 的前缀中受支持通配符子域对象。Starting with .NET Core 2.0 or .NET Framework 4.6 on Windows 10, wildcard subdomains are supported in URI prefixes that are managed by an object. 若要指定通配符子域，请使用"\*"中的 URI 前缀的主机名的一部分的字符。To specify a wildcard subdomain, use the "\*" character as part of the hostname in a URI prefix. 例如， *http://\*.foo.com/*。For example, *http://\*.foo.com/*. 将其作为参数传递方法。Pass this as the argument to the method. 这适用于自.NET Core 2.0 或 Windows 10; 上的.NET Framework 4.6 起在早期版本中，这会生成。This works as of .NET Core 2.0 or .NET Framework 4.6 on Windows 10; in earlier versions, this generates an . > [!WARNING] > 顶级通配符绑定 (*http://\*: 8080 /* 并*http://+:8080*) 应**不**使用。Top-level wildcard bindings (*http://\*:8080/* and *http://+:8080*) should **not** be used. 顶级通配符绑定可能会为应用带来安全漏洞。Top-level wildcard bindings can open up your app to security vulnerabilities. 此行为同时适用于强通配符和弱通配符。This applies to both strong and weak wildcards. 使用显式主机名而不是通配符。Use explicit host names rather than wildcards. 如果可控制整个父域（区别于易受攻击的 `*.com`），则子域通配符绑定（例如，`*.mysub.com`）不具有此安全风险。Subdomain wildcard binding (for example, `*.mysub.com`) doesn't have this security risk if you control the entire parent domain (as opposed to `*.com`, which is vulnerable). 有关详细信息，请参阅 [rfc7230 第 5.4 条](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230#section-5.4)。See [rfc7230 section-5.4](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230#section-5.4) for more information. 若要开始侦听来自客户端的请求，请将 URI 前缀添加到集合并调用方法。To begin listening for requests from clients, add the URI prefixes to the collection and call the method. 还提供用于处理客户端请求的同步和异步模型。 offers both synchronous and asynchronous models for processing client requests. 使用访问请求和其关联的响应返回的对象方法或其异步对应和方法。Requests and their associated responses are accessed using the object returned by the method or its asynchronous counterparts, the and methods. 同步模型适合，如果你的应用程序应阻止等待客户端请求时，如果你想要一次处理一个请求。The synchronous model is appropriate if your application should block while waiting for a client request and if you want to process only one request at a time. 使用同步模型，调用方法，它等待客户端发送请求。Using the synchronous model, call the method, which waits for a client to send a request. 该方法将返回对象复制到您的处理时出现。The method returns an object to you for processing when one occurs. 在更复杂的异步模型中，你的应用程序不会阻止而将在其自己的执行线程中等待的请求和每个请求进行处理。In the more complex asynchronous model, your application does not block while waiting for requests and each request is processed in its own execution thread. 使用方法，以指定应用程序定义的方法调用每个传入请求。Use the method to specify an application-defined method to be called for each incoming request. 该方法中调用方法可以获取该请求、 处理它，并做出响应。Within that method, call the method to obtain the request, process it, and respond. 在任一模型中，使用访问传入的请求属性，也由对象。In either model, incoming requests are accessed using the property and are represented by objects. 同样，使用访问响应属性，也由对象。Similarly, responses are accessed using the property and are represented by objects. 这些对象共享的一些功能并不能与结合使用的对象，而后者对象因为它们实现客户端、 不是服务器、 行为。These objects share some functionality with the and objects, but the latter objects cannot be used in conjunction with because they implement client, not server, behaviors. 可以要求客户端身份验证。An can require client authentication. 您可以指定特定的方案使用进行身份验证，也可以指定一个委托来决定要使用的方案。You can either specify a particular scheme to use for authentication, or you can specify a delegate that determines the scheme to use. 你必须要求某种形式的身份验证，以获取有关客户端的标识信息。You must require some form of authentication to obtain information about the client's identity. 有关其他信息，请参阅， ，和属性。For additional information, see the , , and properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果您创建使用 https 时，你必须为该侦听器选择服务器证书。If you create an using https, you must select a Server Certificate for that listener. 否则为此查询并意外关闭的连接将失败。Otherwise, an query of this will fail with an unexpected close of the connection. > [!NOTE] > 可以使用 Network Shell (netsh.exe) 来配置服务器证书和其他侦听器选项。You can configure Server Certificates and other listener options by using Network Shell (netsh.exe). 请参阅[Network Shell (Netsh)](/windows-server/networking/technologies/netsh/netsh)的更多详细信息。See [Network Shell (Netsh)](/windows-server/networking/technologies/netsh/netsh) for more details. 可执行文件已开始使用 Windows Server 2008 和 Windows Vista 的传送。The executable began shipping with Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定多个身份验证方案供，该侦听器将请求客户端按以下顺序： `Negotiate`， `NTLM`， `Digest`，然后`Basic`。If you specify multiple authentication schemes for the , the listener will challenge clients in the following order: `Negotiate`, `NTLM`, `Digest`, and then `Basic`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用。The following code example demonstrates using a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

summary.span: 立刻关闭 对象，这样会放弃所有当前排队的请求。

span.span: Shuts down the object immediately, discarding all currently queued requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法释放持有此侦听器的所有资源。This method disposes of all resources held by this listener. 任何挂起的请求不能完成。Any pending requests are unable to complete. 调用此方法之后, 将会收到如果你尝试使用此。After calling this method, you will receive an if you attempt to use this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::AuthenticationSchemes AuthenticationSchemes { System::Net::AuthenticationSchemes get(); void set(System::Net::AuthenticationSchemes value); };
member this.AuthenticationSchemes : System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于客户端身份验证的方案。

span.span: Gets or sets the scheme used to authenticate clients.

value.span: 指示如何对客户端进行身份验证的 枚举值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates how clients are to be authenticated.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的方案来对所有传入请求进行身份验证。The uses the specified scheme to authenticate all incoming requests. 并方法返回传入的客户端请求，仅当成功进行身份验证请求。The and methods return an incoming client request only if the successfully authenticates the request. 您可以通过使用查询已成功经过身份验证的客户端的标识属性。You can interrogate the identity of a successfully authenticated client by using the property. 如果你想对象以使用不同的身份验证机制根据收到的请求的特性 (例如，请求的或属性)，你必须实现选择的方法身份验证方案。If you want an object to use different authentication mechanisms based on characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's or property), you must implement a method that chooses the authentication scheme. 有关如何执行此操作的说明，请参阅属性文档。For instructions about how to do this, see the property documentation. > [!NOTE] > 若要设置此属性来启用摘要式、 NTLM 或 Negotiate 需要， 。To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the , . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用属性来指定身份验证方案。The following code example demonstrates using the property to specify an authentication scheme. [!code-csharp[Net_listener_Basic#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#14)]

exception.span: 此对象已关闭。

span.span: This object has been closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::AuthenticationSchemeSelector ^ AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate { System::Net::AuthenticationSchemeSelector ^ get(); void set(System::Net::AuthenticationSchemeSelector ^ value); };
member this.AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate : System.Net.AuthenticationSchemeSelector with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个委托，调用它来确定用于客户端身份验证的协议。

span.span: Gets or sets the delegate called to determine the protocol used to authenticate clients.

value.span: 委托，它调用用于选择身份验证协议的方法。

span.span: An delegate that invokes the method used to select an authentication protocol.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果你想要处理的特定实例的所有请求使用的相同身份验证协议，不需要设置此属性。If you want the same authentication protocol to be used for all requests handled by a particular instance of , you do not need to set this property. 若要指定要用于所有客户端请求的协议，请使用属性。To specify a protocol to be used for all client requests, use the property. 如果客户端未在其标头，指定身份验证信息调用为每个未经身份验证的传入请求，以确定，如果有，协议用于客户端身份验证指定的委托。If the client has not specified authentication information in its headers, the calls the specified delegate for each unauthenticated incoming request to determine which, if any, protocol to use to authenticate the client. 并方法返回传入的请求仅当成功进行身份验证请求。The and methods return an incoming request only if the successfully authenticated the request. 如果不能对请求进行身份验证，自动发送回 401 响应。If a request cannot be authenticated, the automatically sends back a 401 response. 可以获取成功经过身份验证的客户端使用的标识属性。You can get the identity of a successfully authenticated client using the property. 可以将委派到特定于应用程序的方法的身份验证协议的选择是有用的一个实例使用不同的身份验证协议，具体取决于接收 （适用于请求的特征例如，请求的或属性)。The ability to delegate the choice of authentication protocol to an application-specific method is useful if you want an instance of to use different authentication protocols depending on the characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's or property). > [!NOTE] > 若要设置此属性来启用摘要式、 NTLM 或 Negotiate 需要， 。To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the , . ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置此属性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. [!code-csharp[NclListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NclListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例提供了调用方法的实现委托。The following code example provides an implementation of a method invoked by an delegate. [!code-csharp[NclListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NclListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginGetContext (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetContext(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginGetContext (callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetContext(AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: callback
param.span: 委托，引用客户端请求可用时要调用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when a client request is available.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个用户定义对象，其中包含操作的相关信息。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 操作完成后，此对象会被传递给 callback 委托。

span.span: This object is passed to the callback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 开始异步检索传入的请求。

span.span: Begins asynchronously retrieving an incoming request.

returns.span: 一个指示异步操作状态的 对象。

span.span: An object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法开始异步 （非阻塞） 调用来接收传入的客户端请求。The method begins an asynchronous (non-blocking) call to receive incoming client requests. 调用此方法之前，必须调用方法并添加至少一个统一资源标识符 (URI) 前缀，用于侦听的 URI 将字符串添加到返回的属性。Before calling this method, you must call the method and add at least one Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the returned by the property. 必须通过调用完成异步操作方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`callback`委托。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 在操作完成时，此方法不会阻止。This method does not block while the operation completes. 若要获取传入的请求和块，直到操作完成，请调用方法。To get an incoming request and block until the operation completes, call the method. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法，以指定将处理传入的客户端请求的回调方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method to specify a callback method that will handle incoming client requests. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#12)] 下面的代码示例实现一个回调方法。The following code example implements a callback method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭 。

span.span: Shuts down the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法后，你无法再使用对象。After calling this method, you can no longer use the object. 若要临时暂停对象，请使用方法。To temporarily pause an object, use the method. 此方法关闭列表对象而不会处理排队的请求。This method shut downs the object without processing queued requests. 任何挂起的请求不能完成。Any pending requests are unable to complete. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DefaultServiceNames As ServiceNameCollection

summary.span: 获取由已注册前缀确定的服务提供程序名 (SPN) 的默认列表。

span.span: Gets a default list of Service Provider Names (SPNs) as determined by registered prefixes.

value.span: 一个包含 SPN 列表的 。

span.span: A that contains a list of SPNs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于集成 Windows 身份验证来提供扩展的保护。The property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection. 从初始化的 Spn 的列表属性访问，并且当新的前缀添加到时清除时属性。The list of SPNs is initialized from the property when accessed and cleared when new prefixes are added to the property. 如果应用程序不会设置使用属性上其扩展的保护策略的属性。The property is used if an application doesn't set the property on its extended protection policy. 检索的属性从生成属性根据以下规则：The that is retrieved with the property is built from the property according to the following rules: 1. 如果主机名为"+"、"\*"，或 IPv4 或 IPv6 文字 (等效于"\*"但限制为特定的本地接口)，添加以下的 SPN:If the hostname is "+", "\*", or an IPv4 or IPv6 literal (equivalent to "\*" but restricted to a specific local interface), the following SPN is added: `"HTTP/"` 加上的计算机的完全限定的域名。`"HTTP/"` plus the fully qualified domain name of the computer. 1. 如果主机名不包含点 （任何域或子域），尝试解决使用 DNS 名称的完全限定域名 (相同的行为由)。If the hostname contains no dots (no domains or subdomains), an attempt is made to resolve the fully-qualified domain name using DNS (the same behavior used by ). 如果可解析的完全限定域名，则添加以下的 Spn:If the fully-qualified domain name can be resolved, the following SPNs are added: `"HTTP/"` 此外，主机名 （短名称）。`"HTTP/"` plus the hostname (the short name). `"HTTP/"` 加上主机名的完全限定的域名。`"HTTP/"` plus the fully qualified domain name for the hostname. 1. 如果主机名不包含点 （任何域或子域） 和完全限定的域名不能为已解决，添加以下的 SPN:If the hostname contains not dots (no domains or subdomains) and a fully-qualified domain name can't be resolved, the following SPN is added: `"HTTP/"` 此外，主机名。`"HTTP/"` plus the hostname. 1. 如果主机名包含点 （域或子域），将添加以下的 SPN:If the hostname contains dots (domains or subdomains), the following SPN is added: `"HTTP/"` 此外，主机名。`"HTTP/"` plus the hostname. 属性可以使用应用程序，若要查看的默认 Spn 将用于身份验证如果不提供任何自定义列表的列表。The property can be used by an application to review the list of default SPNs which will be used for authentication if no custom list is supplied. 如果需要其他 Spn，应用程序可以添加它们使用之一方法。If other SPNs are needed, an application can add them using one of the methods. 使用扩展的保护策略根据做出决策所请求的 URL，因为这可能伪装时，它是不安全。It is not safe when using extended protection to make policy decisions based on the requested URL, since this can be spoofed. 相反，应用程序应依赖于或属性以使此类策略决策。Rather, applications should rely on the or properties to make such policy decisions.

related.span: 带有扩展保护的集成 Windows 身份验证

span.span: Integrated Windows Authentication with Extended Protection

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.HttpListenerContext EndGetContext(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed
Public Function EndGetContext (asyncResult As IAsyncResult) As HttpListenerContext

param.name: asyncResult
param.span: 启动异步操作时获得的 对象。

span.span: An object that was obtained when the asynchronous operation was started.

summary.span: 完成检索传入的客户端请求的异步操作。

span.span: Completes an asynchronous operation to retrieve an incoming client request.

returns.span: 表示客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法时，通常在调用委托时，若要获取的应用程序定义的回调方法中对象，包含传入的客户端请求和其关联的响应。The method is called, usually within an application-defined callback method invoked by a delegate, to obtain the object that contains an incoming client request and its associated response. 此方法完成以前通过调用启动的操作方法。This method completes an operation previously started by calling the method. 如果该操作未完成，此方法阻止，直至它。If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does. 因为在调用方法要求对象，此对象通常传递到回调方法，将使用状态对象传递到方法。Because calling the method requires the object, this object is typically passed into a callback method by using the state object passed into the method. 可以使用来获取此状态对象属性的`asyncResult`对象。You can obtain this state object by using the property of the `asyncResult` object. 有关使用异步编程模型的详细信息，请参阅[异步调用同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了调用的回调方法的实现方法。The following code example shows the implementation of a callback method that calls the method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#13)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于会话的扩展保护的 。

span.span: Get or set the to use for extended protection for a session.

span.span: A that specifies the policy to use for extended protection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于集成 Windows 身份验证来提供扩展的保护。The property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection. 属性，可配置的扩展的保护策略为整个会话。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole session. 属性允许的每个请求的扩展的保护策略的配置。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for each individual request. 属性必须为 `null`。The property must be `null`. 实例在如果有一个直接从其自己的 TLS 会话获取通道绑定令牌 (CBT)。The instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于集成 Windows 身份验证来提供扩展的保护。The property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection. 属性，可配置的扩展的保护策略为整个会话。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole session. 属性，可按每个请求的扩展的保护策略的配置。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy per individual request. 属性必须为 `null`。The property must be `null`. 实例在如果有一个直接从其自己的 TLS 会话获取通道绑定令牌 (CBT)。The instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one. 对于每个请求，该委托可以选择设置，实例将用于提供扩展的保护。For each request, the delegate can choose the settings that the instance will use to provide extended protection. 如果委托返回`null`对于此属性，这表示这属性设置为。If a delegate returns `null` for this property, this represents a which the property set to .

summary.span: 等待传入的请求，接收到请求时返回。

span.span: Waits for an incoming request and returns when one is received.

returns.span: 表示客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents a client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，必须调用方法并添加至少一个用于侦听的 URI 将字符串添加到的 URI 前缀返回的属性。Before calling this method, you must call the method and add at least one URI prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the returned by the property. 有关前缀的详细说明，请参阅类概述。For a detailed description of prefixes, see the class overview. 此方法在等待传入的请求时阻止。This method blocks while waiting for an incoming request. 如果您要处理异步 （单独的线程上），以便你的应用程序不会阻止传入请求，使用方法。If you want incoming requests to be processed asynchronously (on separate threads) so that your application does not block, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置与此 对象关联的领域或资源分区。

span.span: Gets or sets the realm, or resource partition, associated with this object.

value.span: 值，包含与 对象关联的领域名。

span.span: A value that contains the name of the realm associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器使用领域将受保护的资源; 分区每个分区可以有其自己的身份验证方案和/或授权数据库。Servers use realms to partition protected resources; each partition can have its own authentication scheme and/or authorization database. 领域仅用于基本和摘要式身份验证。Realms are used only for basic and digest authentication. 在客户端成功进行身份验证之后，该身份验证对给定领域内的所有资源都有效。After a client successfully authenticates, the authentication is valid for all resources in a given realm. 有关领域的详细说明，请参阅在 RFC 2617 [ https://www.ietf.org/ ](https://www.ietf.org/)。For a detailed description of realms, see RFC 2617 at [https://www.ietf.org/](https://www.ietf.org/). 实例具有只有一个关联的领域。An instance of has only one associated realm. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何设置属性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 允许此实例接收传入的请求。

span.span: Allows this instance to receive incoming requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须调用此方法，然后再调用或方法。This method must be called before you call the or method. 启动后对象，可以使用方法将其停止。After you have started an object, you can use the method to stop it. > [!NOTE] > 如果此侦听器实例使用 https，必须安装并选择服务器证书。If this listener instance uses https, you must install and select a Server Certificate. 否则为此查询并意外关闭的连接将失败。Otherwise, an query of this will fail with an unexpected close of the connection. 可以通过使用 HttpCfg.exe 配置服务器证书和其他侦听器选项。You can configure Server Certificates and other listener options by using HttpCfg.exe. 请参阅[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp)的更多详细信息。See [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp) for more details. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法以开始处理传入的请求。The following code example demonstrates using the method to begin processing incoming requests. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#12)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值控制当使用 NTLM 时是否需要对使用同一传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接的其他请求进行身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether, when NTLM is used, additional requests using the same Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection are required to authenticate.

value.span: 如果第一个请求的 将用于同一连接上的后续请求，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: if the of the first request will be used for subsequent requests on the same connection; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`和特定的 TCP 连接上的第一个请求进行身份验证使用 NTLM，来处理同一个 TCP 连接上的后续请求使用的身份验证信息 () 的初始请求。When this property is set to `true` and the first request over a particular TCP connection is authenticated using NTLM, subsequent requests over the same TCP connection are processed using the authentication information () of the initial request. 此属性在 NTLM 不是身份验证协议时无效。This property has no effect when NTLM is not the authentication protocol. 当指定为身份验证协议协商时，此属性会影响才 NTLM 进行身份验证使用的实际协议。When Negotiate is specified as the authentication protocol, this property has an effect only if NTLM is the actual protocol used for authentication. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为时`true`提高性能，因为不发送其他 NTLM 身份验证质询，则安全风险中不要求所有请求都提供身份验证信息。While setting this property to `true` increases performance because the does not send additional NTLM authentication challenges, there is a security risk in not requiring all requests to provide authentication information. 必须确定为提高性能冒此风险是否值得。You must determine whether the increase in performance is worth this risk. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#14)]

exception.span: 此对象已关闭。

span.span: This object has been closed.
